name: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham DLC: The Squad
name_original: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham DLC: The Squad
description:
LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham DLC: The Squad is an arcade game. It was originally released in 2015. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham DLC: The Squad is available on PC.
